corpusMetadata.description: This corpus is a cleaned and segmented version of multiple publicly available Turkish corpora. It includes texts from Turkish Wikipedia, the Bilkent Turkish Writings Dataset, and translated novels. The current version has no linguistic annotations beyond tokenization.
